answers.answer: Your symptoms do not appear like that of HIV but test at 28 days after your last possible exposure for your peace of mind using the 4th gen Ag/Ab tests.

question: First off thank you to who replies. I was dating a girl for a few months and did have unprotected sex with her. I have a few questions on some things.                   1. I went for a urine test for my commercial drives lic and the doctor said my throat was red and high ph in my urine is this any way related to HIV?                       2. I have been having frequent urination does not hurt and no discharge. Tested for diabetes negative                                          3. I have lost a lot of weight also.                                4. My stools seem soft and look a yellowish green in color.                                                                           5. I have noticed dark like spots on my back and some on my stomach and chest.                                 6. My doctor did basic blood work and a syphlis and chlomedia test and both negative. She said my WBC was a little high and my playlets were a little low.        5. I was having a stiff neck and some muscle pains with some dizziness. After I was checked for my blood sugar I started to drink a lot of Gatorade and  the muscle pains went away the dizziness as well.      6. My doctor also stated that my bad cholesterol has dropped but the good stayed the same.             7.Does electrolyte imbalance and bad cholesterol   have anything to do with HIV?                                       I have had no fever or flu like symptoms or ther then a runny nose and a tooth infection.                             8. Groin area pain as well.                                            Once again thank you for your time and your rely
title: HIV questions
